net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: ATTACK_JSON = "attackJSON"] [h: NAME = "name"] [h: ATK_BONUS = "atkBonus"] [h: DMG_BONUS = "dmgBonus"] [h: DMG_DIE = "dmgDie"] [h: DMG_DICE = "dmgDice"] [h: CRIT_BONUS_DICE = "critBonusDice"] [h: DMG_TYPE = "dmgType"] [h: DMG_BONUS_EXPR = "dmgBonusExpr"] [h: NEW_ATTACK = "NewAttack"] [h: attackJson = getProperty (ATTACK_JSON)] [h: formatted = "
" + json.indent(attackJson, 3) + "
"] [s, r: formatted]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Print AttackJSON
